Name.help_text: Name to use in the output binary's directory. Maximum length is 4 characters.

Length.help_text: Length of output binary, extra space will be filled with 0xFF's. If length is smaller than required, an error will be reported. If set to 0, the length will be computed as needed by the tool.

OemId.help_text: ID of the OEM creating the Key Manifest

KeyManifestId.help_text: ID number of the Key Manifest. This is matched by the verifier against the value stored in the platformâ€™s FPF.

InstanceId.help_text: Refers to the instance of the Key Manifest at hand

PartitionFlags.help_text: Refers to flags relevant to manifest for a specific partition.

PartitionVersion.help_text: Refers to the version of the partition of the relevant manifest

VendorId.help_text: Shows the vendor ID owning the Key Manifest at hand

VersionControlNumber.help_text: The VCN is incremented whenever a change is made to the FW making it incompatible from an update perspective with previous FW releases

SecurityVersionNumber.help_text: The security version number of the OEM Key Manifest

VersionMajor.help_text: Indicates the major number in the version numbering

VersionMinor.help_text: Indicates the minor number in the version numbering

VersionHotfix.help_text: Indicates the hotfix number in the version numbering

VersionBuild.help_text: Indicates the build number in the version numbering

HashBinary.help_text: Path to binary file containing Public Key Hash)
